original_title: Donovan: The Donovan Concert - Live in L.A.
overview: Musical - This incredible performance DVD was recorded in front of a packed house of adoring fans at the Kodak Theatre in Hollywood. On this, his first music DVD, Donovan performed all his legendary hits and cult classics. -  Donovan Leitch Jr., Mike Love
title: Donovan: The Donovan Concert - Live in L.A.
